sentences.en: On June 5, 1976, Needham delivered his last sermon as Master of Caius College. I quote from that sermon.
sentences.cn: 1976年6月5日，李约瑟作为剑桥大学凯斯学院的院长进行了他最后一次说教或演讲，下边就是他的讲话的引用。

sentences.en: The fellowship at Caius took care of my immediate employment problem.
sentences.cn: 凯斯提供的奖学金解决了我的工作问题.
